about_the_game:
Looking for a sci-fi take on traditional viking music? Need bone chilling ambient soundtracks for a halloween party?
Then this is the soundtrack for you!

The chilling soundtrack for Apsulov: End of Gods is a mix of modern music and traditional Norse instruments. This unique music genre together with the ambient soundtracks, will heighten the mood of any moment of your day and make you feel like the protagonist of a post apocalyptic viking world.
